title: ‘Anatomy of a Fall’ wins top prize as women dominate Cannes
description: French director Justine Triet slams Macron's government in acceptance speech for 'repression' of pension protests.

title: Netherlands arrests more than 1,500 climate activists
description: Climate activists blocked parts of a motorway in The Hague to protest against Dutch fossil fuel subsidies.

title: Luton promoted to Premier League after beating Coventry City
description: Luton Town made it to the Premier League for the first time after a penalty shootout win in the playoff final.

title: What’s behind British political opposition to immigration?
description: The number of arrivals in the United Kingdom is at record levels despite hardline government policies.

title: At least 11 killed in Pakistan avalanche
description: Four women and a boy were among those killed in the disaster near the Shounter Pass in northern Pakistan, police say.

title: At least three killed in shooting at Iran-Afghan border
description: Several people were reportedly injured in the clash, which came amid tensions between the neighbours over water rights.

title: Ukraine says Russia eases attacks on Bakhmut to regroup
description: Ukrainian defence minister says Russian attacks have decreased as Moscow troops are being 'replaced and regrouped'.

title: Erdogan, Kilicdaroglu rally supporters before Turkish election
description: Opposition leader Kemal Kilicdaroglu takes on President Recep Tayyip Erdogan in Sunday's presidential election run-off.

title: Bayern win 11th consecutive Bundesliga title as Dortmund stumble
description: Dramatic finale to the season sees Bayern Munich win a record-extending title with last-gasp goal as Dortmund draw.

title: Serbia’s President Vucic steps down as head of governing party
description: The president says he will remain head of state, amid ongoing anti-government protests after two mass shootings.

title: Ukraine set for a title-deciding game in war-torn football season
description: League leaders Shakhtar Donetsk face second-place Dnipro-1 in title showdown as a remarkable season nears its end.

title: Serbia blasts NATO forces over inaction during Kosovo clashes
description: Serbia's top leadership, led by President Aleksandar Vucic, meets in Belgrade following violent clashes in Kosovo.

title: Russia to US: No lectures on nuclear weapon deployments
description: Russian embassy calls US criticism of Moscow's tactical nuclear weapon deployment to Belarus hypocritical.

title: United Nations backs Sudan envoy as army seeks to expel him
description: Sources in Sudan's foreign ministry told Al Jazeera Volker Perthes will not be allowed back into the war-torn country.

title: Premier League survival at stake on last day of gripping season
description: Everton, Leeds and Leicester in relegation dogfight, while a final European spot is up for grabs on last day of 2022/23.

title: How will defunct ‘kingmaker’ alliance affect Turkey’s election?
description: Big question a day before the run-off vote is what effect a recent split in a potential kingmaker coalition will have?

title: Assad: The rehabilitation of a war criminal
description: Syria's president returns to Arab League after years of spin and war crimes denial. Plus covering Ecuador’s narco trade.

title: Cate Blanchett: From Oscar-winning acting to refugee advocacy
description: The double Academy Award winner discusses how advocating for refugees with the UNHCR has changed her outlook.

title: How did Greece go from bankruptcy to economic growth?
description: The economy is recovering after a decade-long debt crisis, but are Greeks feeling the benefits?

title: Turkish presidential run-off leaves Syrians with uncertain future
description: The Turkish election has seen rising anti-refugee rhetoric, leaving many Syrians worried about their future.

title: Man who opened flying plane’s door was in hurry to get off: Media
description: Passenger opened emergency door on Asiana Airlines Airbus A321 when it was about 213 metres (700 ft) above the ground.

title: US charges two over China-backed plot against Falun Gong
description: Two suspects were charged with crimes related to an operation to revoke the Falun Gong organisation's tax status.

title: Pink Floyd’s Roger Waters says Berlin gig controversy a ‘smear’
description: Waters said depictions of an 'unhinged fascist demagogue' have been featured in Pink Floyd concerts since 1980.

title: Ukraine claims Russia planning ‘massive’ incident at nuclear site
description: Ukraine's defence intelligence directorate warns Russia will simulate an attack at the Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant.

title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 458
description: As the war enters its 458th day, we take a look at the main developments.
